member.name: P:Ocelot.Configuration.File.FileRateLimitOptions.QuotaExceededMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that will be used as a formatter for the QuotaExceeded response message. If none specified the default will be: API calls quota exceeded! maximum admitted {0} per {1}.

member.name: M:Ocelot.DependencyInjection.OcelotBuilder.AddDefaultAspNetServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcCoreBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary:
Adds default ASP.NET services which are the minimal part of the gateway core.
Finally the builder adds Newtonsoft.Json services via the extension-method.
To remove these services, use custom builder in the extension-method.
member.remarks:
Note that the following extensions being called:
- , impossible to remove.
-
-
- .
Warning! The following extensions being called:
-
-
-
- , removable.
member.param: The default builder being returned by extension-method.

member.name: M:Ocelot.Logging.OcelotLogger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,Ocelot.Infrastructure.RequestData.IRequestScopedDataRepository)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Please note: the log event message is designed to use placeholders ({RequestId}, {PreviousRequestId}, and {Message}). If you're using a logger like Serilog, it will automatically capture these as structured data properties, making it easier to query and analyze the logs later.
member.param: The main logger type, per default the Microsoft implementation.
Repository, saving and getting data to/from HttpContext.Items.
member.exception: The ILogger object is injected in OcelotLoggerFactory, it can't be verified before.

member.summary: We should make sure we dispose the content and response message to close the connection to the downstream service.

member.name: P:Ocelot.Middleware.OcelotPipelineConfiguration.PreErrorResponderMiddleware
member.summary: This is called after the global error handling middleware so any code before calling next.invoke is the next thing called in the Ocelot pipeline. Anything after next.invoke is the last thing called in the Ocelot pipeline before we go to the global error handler.
member.value: A delegate object.

member.name: P:Ocelot.Middleware.OcelotPipelineConfiguration.PreAuthenticationMiddleware
member.summary: This is to allow the user to run any extra authentication before the Ocelot authentication kicks in.

member.summary: This allows the user to completely override the ocelot authentication middleware.

member.summary: This is to allow the user to run any extra authorization before the Ocelot authentication kicks in.
